code:
import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{fetchSeenNews}from'./thunks';export const userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:{userData:{},userSeenNews:[],isAdmin:false},reducers:{setUser:(state,action)=>{state.userData=action.payload;},setSeenNews:(state,action)=>{state.userSeenNews=action.payload;},setAdmin:(state,action)=>{state.isAdmin=action.payload;}},extraReducers:{[fetchSeenNews.fulfilled]:(state,action)=>{state.userSeenNews=action.payload;}}});// Функция действия генерируется на каждую функцию релюсера(reducer), определённую в createSlice
export const{setUser,setSeenNews,setAdmin}=userSlice.actions;export default userSlice.reducer;
